{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Intel WiFi Link 5300 (full size).jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless Network Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Intel_WiFi_Link_5300_(full_size) |wikipedia = |brand = Intel |model = WiFi Link 5300 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 533AN_MMW (full size) |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = October 3, 2009 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Intel_WiFi_Link_5300_(full_size) |sernum = |wlclass = AN900 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = |vendor_id = 8086 |device_id = 4236 |subvendor_id = 8086 |subdevice_id = 1011 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PD9533ANM, PD9533ANMU |icid = 1000M-533ANM, 1000M-533ANMU |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:16:EA, 00:21:6A |chip1 = Intel;JC82539MDE; |chip2 = Intel;JC82539RDE; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = DFS, |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/01/2008 |estreldate = |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B008SM0O0I |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 3x3 MIMO, dual chip assumed to be using a JC82539 chipset (JC82539MDE + JC82539RDE) "[[USI]]" and "SP MC3x3 QS CO" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. ==Notes== ===pci ids=== 4235 Ultimate N WiFi Link 5300
4236 Ultimate N WiFi Link 5300 ===Variants=== 533AN_MMW (supports 802.11a/b/g/Draft-N in a PCIe Mini Card form factor)
533AN_HMW (supports 802.11a/b/g/Draft-N in a PCIe Half Mini Card form factor) [[Category:English Documentation]]
